Description.Name: Terrain Mapping Sensors
Description.Details: The current sensor systems have lacked the capabilities to properly map the terrain in our mission drop zones. With some simple rewiring and adding the proper software to the Argo computers, we can adapt the general sensor array to support terrain scans.

AssignedCastDescription: Finally I would be able see where to land in advance! No more accidentally landing in a swamp because Darius sent us to the wrong area.
